page.title: 07Recreation
page.content: We asked some children in our block what they did in thear spare time. The {activities}they do include swimming football dancing playing cards reading motorbiking making models and going to {cubs}and{brownies.}All the children that we asked had a T.V. and they watched about 2_3 hours a day.They all went to the cinema but only about once a year.Most under 11's go to bed by half past 8 and get up about 7a.m. Everybody had a {big garden}with trees and most people had about 2 sheds and a swing.Most people had firs and blossom trees and bluebells, daffodils, daisies, pansies and dandelions.
